subject: This Week on CBS SportsLine.com: Top 50 jerks of all time
body:
This Week on CBS SportsLine - a weekly programming guide





 






 



June 25-July 1, 2007






 
 
 
 







 



This programming guide is updated throughout the week. Click here to see the latest version






 


 


 



Top 50 jerks of all time
Top 50 jerks of all time That's the sour puss we all know and hate on No. 9 Barry. (US Presswire)


    

      
      Bullies, blowhards and 'bolivian.' Boras, Belle, Brown and Bonds. Sports 
      has had its share of jerks and dirty rotten scoundrels over the years, 
      and Mike Freeman features his inaugural Top 
      50. | Talk back: Your 
      list.
 






 

 





 Thursday: The NBA Draft


    

      
      Greg Oden (pictured) and Kevin Durant are primed to go 1-2 to Portland 
      and Seattle in Thursday's NBA 
      Draft. Don't miss Tony Mejia's pick-by-pick analysis.
    

  
• Mock drafts | Mejia's prospect rankings | Tracker  

 




U P C O M I N G  V I D E O



Daily

 
Sports Update
What's happening in sports? Jason Horowitz and Amber Wilson have the lowdown on the showdowns.







TuesdayJune 26

 
Fantasy Football Show
Keep up with your fellow owners in the offseason with Dave Richard and Jamey Eisenberg, every week. 








WednesdayJune 27

 
Auto Racing
Pete Pistone previews this week's race at New Hampshire.







ThursdayJune 28

 
Fantasy Baseball
Amber Wilson and David Gonos help you plan your lineup for the upcoming week.
Baseball
Senior writer Scott Miller chats with Amber Wilson about his latest Hot Topic in MLB.
Gregg Doyel's Hate Mail
National Columnist brings his schtick to the small screen. 








Complete video schedule for the week 





 


 





U P C O M I N G  S C H E D U L E



MondayJune 25

 
Wimbledon
A fortnight of play gets under way at the All England Club.








TuesdayJune 26

 
Baseball
Eric Mack's Power Rankings ... and his top Fantasy Power Players.








WednesdayJune 27

 
SPiN
Gather, guests, for ClayNation!








ThursdayJune 28

 
Golf
The U.S. Women's Open gets under way and Steve Elling's there to cover it.







FridayJune 29

 
Fantasy Baseball
Eric Mack's prospects report.









SaturdayJune 30

 
Fantasy Baseball
David Gonos' Hitting Planner for Week 14.








SundayJuly 1

 
Auto Racing
Nextel Cup goes on the road at New Hampshire.
Fantasy Baseball
Get your lineup set early -- don't miss Eric Mack's Pitching Planner.







Next Week

 
Wimbledon
Your champions will be crowned on the weekend. 






 




K E Y   D A T E S



July 19

 
Golf
Tiger Woods begins defense of his British Open title at Carnoustie.







July 29

 
Auto Racing
NASCAR goes to Indianapolis for 400 miles at the Brickyard.







Aug. 5

 
NFL
Pro Football Hall of Fame Game, New Orleans vs. Pittsburgh.
